narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Summit Bhc Henryvillle, LLC is a Substance Abuse Rehabilitation Facility provider based in Terre Haute, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $90.6M in Medicaid payments across 221K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $90.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
